column4: Hello, I have a web server with vsftpd and i use the FTP to upload junk into /var/www to go online - but its uploaded with no permissions (apache cannot read it, so it does not show up online).  How can I keep my /var/www directory open to all?
- but when i upload new stuff it has no permissions
check umask if you want new files written in the dir to have certain permissions
